Terms of Use

Effective Date: February, 2024

Welcome to Paysusofi! These Terms of Use govern your use of the Paysusofi website and mobile application. By accessing or using our services, you agree to abide by these terms.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using Paysusofi, you agree to comply with these Terms of Use and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please refrain from using our services.

2. Use of Services

  • Account Creation: You may be required to create an account to use certain features. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.
  • User Conduct: You agree not to engage in any activities that may disrupt or interfere with the proper functioning of Paysusofi.
  • Accuracy of Information: You are responsible for providing accurate and up-to-date information when using our services.

3. Privacy

Your use of Paysusofi is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review the Privacy Policy to understand our practices regarding the collection and use of your personal information.

4. Intellectual Property

  • Ownership: All content and intellectual property on Paysusofi, including logos, trademarks, and software, are the property of Paysusofi or its licensors.
  • Use of Content: You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content from Paysusofi without prior written consent.

5. Payments

  • Transaction Terms: By making transactions through Paysusofi, you agree to abide by the transaction terms outlined in the app.
  • Fees: Any fees associated with transactions will be clearly communicated. You agree to pay any applicable fees.

6. Termination

Paysusofi reserves the right to terminate or suspend your account at its sole discretion for any reason, including violation of these Terms of Use.

7. Disclaimers

Paysusofi is provided “as is” without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of our services.

8. Limitation of Liability

Paysusofi and its affiliates shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.

9. Changes to Terms

Paysusofi reserves the right to update, change, or modify these Terms of Use at any time without notice. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically.

10. Governing Law

These Terms of Use are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Nigeria.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Terms of Use, please contact us at support@Paysusofi.com
